fields.name: url
fields.description: url to the map in the digitised file viewer

fields.name: work_url
fields.description: url to the work in the Trove map category

fields.name: publication
fields.description: publication place, publisher, and publication date (if available)

fields.name: copyright_status
fields.description: copyright status based on available metadata (scraped from web page)

fields.name: coordinates
fields.description: map coordinates, either a point or a bounding box (format is 'W--E/N--S', eg: 'E 130⁰50'--E 131⁰00'/S 12⁰30'--S 12⁰40')

fields.name: filesize
fields.description: size of TIFF file in bytes

fields.name: copy_role
fields.description: code indicating type of download available
